ygData.subject: Server/Guild Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Evening noble players, I am new to this group and a semi-newbie back from a EQ break.  My guild (Blackburrow Brawlers) has just about died out (on Kane Bayle
ygData.messageBody:
Evening noble players,

I am new to this group and a semi-newbie back from a EQ break. My
guild (Blackburrow Brawlers) has just about died out (on Kane Bayle
server). I am looking for a good server/guild that will allow me to
join and if necessary start fresh on a new server. Do any of you
noble knights and ladies have any advice on where to go to find a
good server and a strong active guild?

Many thanks and blessings upon you, noble warriors...

Xxana
Cleric 7
